articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS, MICHAEL BIESECKER, SARAH EL DEEB and SARAH PARVINI
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — In what appears to be a sophisticated, remote attack, pagers used by hundreds of members of Hezbollah exploded almost simultaneously in Lebanon and Syria Tuesday, killing at least nine people — including an 8-year-old girl — and wounding thousands more.
articles.title: Hundreds of pagers exploded in Lebanon and Syria in a deadly attack. Here's what we know.

articles.author: BASSEM MROUE, ABBY SEWELL and KAREEM CHEHAYEB
articles.description: BEIRUT (AP) — Pagers used by hundreds of members of the militant group Hezbollah exploded near simultaneously in Lebanon and Syria on Tuesday, killing at least nine people — including an 8-year-old girl — and wounding several thousand, officials said.
articles.title: Hezbollah hit by a wave of exploding pagers and blames Israel. At least 9 dead, thousands injured

articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS, MICHAEL BIESECKER, SARAH EL DEEB and SARAH PARVINI
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — In what appears to be a sophisticated, remote attack, pagers used by hundreds of members of Hezbollah exploded almost simultaneously in Lebanon and Syria Tuesday, killing at least nine people — including an 8-year-old girl — and wounding thousands more.
articles.title: Hundreds of pagers exploded in Lebanon and Syria in a deadly attack. Here's what we know.

articles.author: LARRY NEUMEISTER, MICHAEL R. SISAK and JENNIFER PELTZ
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Sean “Diddy” Combs headed to jail Tuesday to await trial in a federal sex trafficking case that accuses him of presiding over a sordid empire of sexual crimes protected by blackmail and shocking acts of violence.
articles.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs jailed by judge after sex trafficking indictment

articles.author: DIANE JEANTET
articles.description: AVIGNON, France (AP) — A 71-year-old French man admitted in court Tuesday that for nearly a decade, he repeatedly drugged his unwitting wife and invited dozens of men to rape her while she lay unconscious in their bed.
articles.title: A French man admits in court to drugging his wife so that he and dozens of men could rape her

articles.author: PATRICK WHITTLE
articles.description: A key employee who labeled a doomed experimental submersible unsafe prior to its last, fatal voyage testified Tuesday that the tragedy could have been prevented if a federal safety agency had investigated his complaint.
articles.title: A key employee says the Titan sub tragedy could have been prevented

articles.author: BARBARA ORTUTAY
articles.description: Instagram is making teen accounts private by default as it tries to make the platform safer for children amid a growing backlash against how social media affects young people's lives.
articles.title: Instagram makes teen accounts private as pressure mounts on the app to protect children

articles.author: ALANIS THAMES
articles.description: MIAMI GARDENS, Fla. (AP) — The Miami Dolphins placed Tua Tagovailoa on injured reserve Tuesday after the quarterback was diagnosed with his third concussion in two years.
articles.title: Dolphins place Tua Tagovailoa on injured reserve after latest concussion

articles.author: ALANNA DURKIN RICHER and STEPHANY MATAT
articles.description: WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. (AP) — Florida law enforcement officials will launch their own criminal investigation into the apparent assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump that will run parallel to the federal probe, Gov.
articles.title: Florida will launch criminal probe into apparent assassination attempt of Trump, governor says

articles.author: PATRICK AFTOORA ORSAGOS and MICHAEL RUBINKAM
articles.description: SPRINGFIELD, Ohio (AP) — Ohio stationed state police at Springfield schools Tuesday in response to a rash of bomb threats — the vast majority that officials said came from overseas —- after former President Donald Trump and his running mate, Ohio Sen.
articles.title: Overseas threats hit the Ohio city where Trump and Vance lied about Haitians eating pets
